biotools.summary: A method for detecting variants directly from next-generation reads without a reference sequence. It uses the de Bruijn graph implementation in the Cortex framework as a basis and allows the user to identify bubbles in these graphs that represent polymorphisms, quickly, easily and sensitively.

bioschemas.name: Bubbleparse
